Package market.traders

Class Trader

java.lang.Object
market.traders.Trader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Runnable, Searchable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Company, HumanInvestor, InvestmentFund
public class Trader extends Object implements Runnable, Searchable, Serializable
Base class for all types of object that can perform some trading on a market.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Trader

      public Trader(String tradingIdentifier, HashMap<String,Float> investmentBudget, String name, String type, boolean isBear, World world)
      Parameters:
      tradingIdentifier - this identifier should uniquely identify the trader in the world
      investmentBudget - Starting budget of a trader
      name - name on a trader
      type - type of a trader. I thought about using this.getClass().getName() instead of this but I was not sure.
      isBear - boolean that influences the transaction probability of a trader
      world - world on which trader lives

    • tradeOn

      public void tradeOn(String operation, Dealer dealer)
      Function which select random market from the world, then selects random asset and random amount of it and then ask market for transaction
      Parameters:
      operation - can be "buy" or "sell"

    • addBudget

      public void addBudget(Asset asset, float amount)
      Function that first change parameters of asset (amount In Circulation, hype, # of owners) -> Increase amount in Investors budget -> Updates investor's budget in gold.
      Parameters:
      asset - which asset we want to change in budget
      amount - how much we want to add to the budget

    • subtractBudget

      public void subtractBudget(Asset asset, float amount)
      Function that first change parameters of asset (amount In Circulation, hype, # of owners) -> Decrease amount in Investors budget (To somehow prevent some very small amount if amount decreases below 0.1 it is removed from the budget) -> Updates investor's budget in gold.
      Parameters:
      asset -
      amount -

      public void operation()
